segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit worried about what I'm seeing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman, standing in a puddle of water like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so distracted, not even noticing the water overflowing all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, they're being so mischievous, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't get into too much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stool is a recipe for disaster, reaching up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, she's just standing there, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don't want to cause a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a tough call, but I think I'll just keep an eye on them from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: After all, it's not my place to interfere, but I just hope everyone stays safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't shake this feeling of unease, though, watching them like this.
segments.speaker: PAR
